Translations.Text: Nnan d imvebboen n ugdud n Feraun: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear amusnaw
Ib$a a kwen issuffe$ si tmurt nnwen, d acu t lameo nnwen
Nnan: "anef as, neppa akked gma s. Azen iberraeen ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseeear amusnaw
Usan d iseeearen n Feraun, nnan: "s tidep, ad a$ tkafiv, ma d nekwni ara i$elben
Inna: "ih, u, s tidep, a ppilim d iqoiben
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggoev kecc, ne$ a nveggeo nekwni
Inna: "veggoet"! Mi veggoen, sdehcen allen n l$aci, ssagwden ten. Bbwin d sseur anect ilat
Nweeea i Musa: "veggeo taakwazt ik"! Apan tesseblaa ayen d uenaan
Akka ay pwa$elben. U$alen ar deffir, d unqisen
Inna Feraun: "day tumnem yis, uqbel ma aammde$ awen? Ayagi, war ccekk, d tifxep. Tundim p di temdint, iwakken a ppessuff$em, segs, imezda$ is. Ihi, deqqal a ppeeoem
War ccekk, ad awen gezme$ afus ssya, avao ssya. Sinna, ih, a kwen semmoe$ akw $ef imudag
Nnan: "nekwni a nu$al ar Mass nne
Terriv d ppao segne$, imi kan numen s issekniyen n Mass nne$, mi $ d usan. A Mass nne$! Azen a$ d uubeo, Ddem leowae nne$ d imvuaen
